channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
1. How do I change the starting outfit? Only for the 1st time you log of course. I don't need the IDs, but since on RuneJava you start with nothing equipped, I don't know how. How would I do this?
2. I followed the adding menus tutorial, and I got this:
[img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o129/daggerheart8/untitled.jpg[/img]
I want to remove the qj#
The tut I used is by devred or something forgot name sorry, but its a tutorial on adding menus.

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Made it look like this but he doesnt have it equipped when the new person logs in:

//Giving the player an unique look /*playerEquipment[playerHat]= 1153; playerEquipment[playerCape]= 1007; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= 1725; playerEquipment[playerChest]= 1115; playerEquipment[playerShield]= 1191; playerEquipment[playerLegs]= 1067; playerEquipment[playerHands]= 1059; playerEquipment[playerFeet]= 1061(); playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing(); playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows(); playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= 1323;*/

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @This_is_not_an_Alt_P This is not an Alt :P
item.description:
@This_is_not_an_Alt_P wrote:

find this in player.java

// Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1; playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = -1; playerEquipment[playerChest] = -1; playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = -1; playerEquipment[playerHands] = -1; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = -1; playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

like this?

public void Commands() { sendQuest("Commands",8144); sendQuest("@yel@::home - teles you to home",8147); sendQuest("@gre@::tzhaar - teles you to the tzhaar NPCS.",8148); sendQuest("@cya@::pk - teles you to the pk arena.",8149); sendQuest("@red@::battle - teles you to NPC arena 1",8150); sendQuest("@blu@::battle2 - teles you to NPC areana 2",8151); showInterface(8134); showInterfaceSomething(8134); flushOutStream(); }

or what? Sorry this is my first server :\

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

add

showInterfaceSomething(8134);

at the bottom of your code under showinterface.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Tons of -1s

and, also there is no q7 it goes up to 100. I search for q7 and q8, but it cant be found. here is the code i added for the menu:

public void Commands() { sendQuest("Commands",8144); sendQuest("@yel@::home - teles you to home",8147); sendQuest("@gre@::tzhaar - teles you to the tzhaar NPCS.",8148); sendQuest("@cya@::pk - teles you to the pk arena.",8149); sendQuest("@red@::battle - teles you to NPC arena 1",8150); sendQuest("@blu@::battle2 - teles you to NPC areana 2",8151); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

and the command to open it:

} else if(command.startsWith("commands")) { Commands();

Read full topic
